reviews.text: I stayed here with 6 people in a suite and the front desk personnel were very friendly. They helped me find parking spots, and also provided good information of the local area. The suite was very clean and had everything you needed for 6 people to stay. This was my first visit and based off of that I will be going back.

reviews.text: Everything was good about this stay - the location so close to Disneyland and plenty of food places, the swimming pool, the beds were comfy, the service was friendly, the place was clean. Highly recommend!

reviews.text: Stayed one night only on this holiday with a very late night check-in. Late arrival of our flight meant we arrived at 1am and had to use the night window for check-in. It was unseasonally cold and the check-in staff member was incredibly slow booking us in. We stood shivering in the cold wind for 15 minutes while he mucked around with my credit card and sorted paperwork allocating our room, even though we had advised of our expected late arrival. Nevertheless, I'd recommend this hotel. Our room was fairly spacious with two queen beds, a very clean bathroom, small table and tub chairs, and decent quality amenities. It's right across the road from the main entrance to Disneyland, and although we didn't use the pool area, it looked very nice. Breakfast room is small and they don't offer much other than sugary cereals and danishes/muffins etc. It's right next door to Maccas which is 24hr which might be good for families. I stayed in this hotel more than ten years ago when holidaying in Anaheim with the family and it was good then too... the standard has not dropped. Price was good and overall I'd recommend this as a great option if you're spending a week in Anaheim to visit Disneyland etc.
reviews.title: VERY Nice Family Property... good value and nicely kept!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My girlfriend and I stayed at this hotel and it was perfect! EXTREMELY close to Disneyland and other attractions in the surrounding area. We were able to walk to each place, which is amazing considering all the traffic headed to Disneyland. The beds were very comfortable and the room was quite spacious. I would recommend this to anyone looking for affordable, comfortable, and clean place to stay in the Disney area.
reviews.title: Great place to stay!

reviews.text: Stayed here in December going to Disneyland. Rooms were just average beds a little hard and rooms a little worn. The outside looks okay, the spa area was fine and the pool was clean. No breakfast which is usually nice. Reception was nice and the price was a good value. We had a two room suite with 1 king bed and 2 queens, very n ice for a large family. A bit of a walk to Disney but manageable.
reviews.title: Good choice for families

reviews.text: Inexpensive motor-hotel directly accross street from Disney California Adventure. Just a short 10 minute walk north down Harbor Blv takes you to the Disneyland Resort entrance. Very convenient to leave car at hotel and walk to Disney-saves money on parking. Front desk staff was very nice and helpful. Room was clean, but average as was expected for the price. Walked to the strip-mall for drinks and food to go (Subway) and next morning walked to Denny's for breakfast before going to Disney. Very convenient location.
reviews.title: Easy walk to Disney

reviews.text: We stayed at the Castle Inn back in September for 8 nights and we weren't dissappointed. It is an older hotel but it was clean and an easy walk to both Disneyland and the Gardenwalk. We had a 4 and a 6 year old with us and they both did the walk easy enough. We stayed in a family suite and when researching, it was the most affordable accomodation of that size by far within walking distance to Disneyland. Also their family suites consist of 1 king bed in the front room & 2 queens in the back room so nobody has to suffer on a sofabed! We found the staff to be super friendly and helpful. We found Marc to be especially helpful with his knowledge of the area and his easy to follow instructions, that he made it that bit easier for us to navigate around.
reviews.title: Great Value for Money

reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights. The room was not clean. The floors were disgusting. The bathroom was very small, and the shower had hardly any water pressure. There was a huge hole in the shower. It was difficult to sleep at night because it is very loud, and the walls are paper thin. I would not recommend this to anybody! Don't waste your money on this hotel.
reviews.title: Not the best place to stay

reviews.text: We've stayed at the Castle Inn about 4 times now and have never been disappointed. It's clean and close to Disneyland! The price is also very affordable, especially when you'll be spending very little time in the hotel. We have no complaints!
reviews.title: Nice walk to Disney

reviews.text: Stayed for two nights. This is an older hotel that is in very good condition over all. The beds are very firm, but not rock hard. The pillows are horrible so bring your own. Thankfully we did, so no real issue there. The room was clean and well kept. Easy walking distance to the Disney resort. Our daughter loved the idea that we were staying in a "castle"! The office staff were all very nice and helpful. They even have a little store that has all kinds of things one might need. We would stay here again for the right price. Our a/c - heater worked great. We had to hunt a bit for outlets to charge our phones, but it all worked out fine.
reviews.title: Very good for the price

description: Castle Inn & Suites is a 200 room hotel located directly across from the Disneyland Resort and just a 7 minute walk to the Disneyland main entrance. We feature all rooms with at least 2 Queen beds and also offer many 2 bedroom family suites with a king size bed and 2 queen beds, with a television in each room, complete with a refrigerator and microwave. We have a heated pool, year around, with a jacuzzi and a children's wading pool. We have coin operated washers and dryers in our on site laundry room, or if you prefer, we offer valet laundry service. Free parking, a gift shop and free WiFi services also await you. Come and enjoy this Castle themed hotel.
